title: Warmth for Sylhet
description: Providing warm clothing to the rural areas of Sylhet, where winters are harsh for low-income families.

title: Dhaka Winter Aid
description: Aiming to collect and distribute winter clothing to homeless people in Dhaka city.

title: Rajshahi Warmth Drive
description: Helping vulnerable people in Rajshahi stay warm by collecting sweaters, blankets, and jackets.

title: Chattogram Comfort Initiative
description: Collecting and distributing winter essentials to underprivileged communities in Chattogram.

title: Mymensingh Winter Relief
description: Providing winter clothing to rural communities in Mymensingh struggling with the cold.

title: Khulna Care Campaign
description: Supporting disadvantaged families in Khulna by delivering donated clothes and blankets.

title: Barishal Blanket Drive
description: Focusing on providing blankets to elderly residents in Barishal facing the cold.

title: Rangpur Winter Help
description: Organizing clothing distribution for low-income families in Rangpur district.
